title: Evernote
description: Evernote's brand colors are characterized by a palette dominated by refreshing and cool tones, comprising shades of green, blue, and grey. Primary colors include the vivid green '2DBE60', symbolizing growth and clarity, paired with oceanic and earthy shades like '2FACB2' and '166A8F'. These colors reflect Evernote's dedication to providing a clean and efficient user experience. The brand's color palette can be explored further on their official website under the color palette section.
